column4: Anyone ever heard of having trouble installing Ubuntu on a Pentiun 4 1.4?  It's a Dell Dimension 8100.  I keep getting errors about SMP and MP tables.  I haven't the slightest where to go from here..
theres an option somewhere when you boot up, an F-key
you can type acpi=off or another command an dthen boot
Danke, rebooting (froze) and will try that.  Do you know what MP tables or SMP are?
